rawConfiguration.text:
![logo](https://www.php.net/images/logos/new-php-logo.svg)

Instrument your application with New Relic - [Add Data](https://one.newrelic.com/launcher/catalog-pack-details.launcher/?pane=eyJuZXJkbGV0SWQiOiJjYXRhbG9nLXBhY2stZGV0YWlscy5jYXRhbG9nLXBhY2stY29udGVudHMiLCJxdWlja3N0YXJ0SWQiOiI0NzVkZWM2OS0xMGM5LTRiYzYtODMxMi0zY2FhMjY2ZmIwMjgifQ==).

Detect common [installation and configuration problems](https://download.newrelic.com/nrdiag/nrdiag_latest.zip) with New Relic agents. Optionally, attach this troubleshooting data to a support case. [Learn more](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/using-new-relic/cross-product-functions/troubleshooting/new-relic-diagnostics)

[Please rate this dashboard](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSclR38J8WbbB2J1tHnllKUkzWZkJhf4SrJGyavpMd4t82NjnQ/viewform?usp=pp_url&entry.1615922415=PHP&entry.358368110=https://onenr.io/0ERzlZYPvQr) here and let us know how we can improve it for you.

widgets.title: Transaction Count (Use filter to get specific data)

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) WHERE (transactionType LIKE '%Web%') and ((tags.language LIKE '%php%') or (appName LIKE '%php%')) EXTRAPOLATE FACET appName

SELECT count(apm.service.transaction.error.count) / count(apm.service.transaction.duration) as 'Error rate' FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE '%PHP%') AND ((transactionType LIKE '%Web%' AND transactionName LIKE '%WebTransaction/Uri%')) LIMIT MAX FACET appName
FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) * percentage(count(*), WHERE error IS true) / 100 as 'Failed transactions' where appName LIKE '%PHP%' facet appName
FROM Transaction SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE error is false) AS 'Success rate' where appName LIKE '%PHP%' facet appName

rawConfiguration.text:
# Application Monitoring

Leverage on New Relic's APM (Application Performance Monitoring) capabilities by setting up custom dashboards, errors inbox, transaction tracing, and service maps.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT count(apm.service.transaction.error.count) / count(apm.service.transaction.duration) as 'Error rate' FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE '%PHP%') AND ((transactionType LIKE '%Web%' AND transactionName LIKE '%WebTransaction/Uri%')) LIMIT MAX FACET appName TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT apdex(apm.service.apdex) as 'App server', apdex(apm.service.apdex.user) as 'End user' FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE '%PHP%') LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(apm.service.overview.web) * 1000 FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE '%PHP%') FACET `segmentName` LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES  AUTO
SELECT average(apm.service.overview.web) * 1000 FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE '%PHP%') FACET `segmentName` LIMIT MAX
SELECT average(apm.service.memory.physical) FROM Metric WHERE appName LIKE '%PHP%' TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT rate(count(apm.service.transaction.duration), 1 minute) as 'Web throughput/min' FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE '%PHP%') AND (transactionType LIKE '%Web%') LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT rate(count(apm.service.transaction.duration), 1 minute) as 'number of transactions/min' FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE '%PHP%') AND (transactionType LIKE '%Web%') LIMIT MAX

FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) as 'Total transactions', average(duration) as 'Avg duration (s)', percentile(duration, 90) as 'Slowest 10% (s)', percentage(count(*), WHERE error is false) AS 'Success rate' where appName LIKE '%PHP%'
FROM Metric SELECT average(apm.service.cpu.usertime.utilization) * 100 as 'Average CPU utilization (%)', average(apm.service.memory.physical) as 'Average memory used (MB)' WHERE appName like '%PHP%'

rawConfiguration.text:
# Database Monitoring

Using the New Relic PHP agent, you have the ability to understand database operations, which is the best indicator of performance.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(count(apm.service.datastore.operation.duration), 1 minute) FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE '%PHP%') FACET `datastoreType`, `operation`, `table` LIMIT 5 TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Top 5 Database Operations by Time Consumed

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT sum(apm.service.datastore.operation.duration * 1000) FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE '%PHP%') FACET `datastoreType`, `table`, `operation` LIMIT 5 TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT average(apm.service.datastore.operation.duration * 1000) FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE 
'php_lighttpd') FACET `datastoreType`, `table`, `operation` LIMIT 5 TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
# Infrastructure Monitoring

Trace the host related information at real-time using New Relic's Infra Agent. Your entire infrastructure can be observed, whether it is running in the cloud or on dedicated servers, or in containers running in orchestrated environments.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT average(apm.service.transaction.duration) as responseTime FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE '%php%') FACET `appName` LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT rate(sum(apm.service.cpu.usertime.utilization), 1 second) * 100 as cpuUsage FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE '%PHP%') FACET `appName` LIMIT 20 TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(apm.service.memory.physical) * rate(count(apm.service.instance.count), 1 minute) / 1000 as memoryUsage FROM Metric WHERE (appName LIKE '%PHP%') LIMIT 20 FACET appName TIMESERIES AUTO

rawConfiguration.text:
# Browser Monitoring

With the New Relic PHP agent, you'll acknowledge the browser related information.

widgets.title: Initial Page Load and Route Change

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT percentile(duration, 50) FROM BrowserInteraction WHERE (appId = 556199596) AND (`mobileOptimized` IS NULL) AND (category IN ('Initial page load', 'Route change')) SINCE 1 week AGO FACET CASES (WHERE category = 'Initial page load' AS 'Initial page load (Window load + AJAX)', WHERE category = 'Route change' AS 'Route change') TIMESERIES auto

SELECT average(windowLoad) AS 'Average', percentile(windowLoad, 95) AS 'Percentile', percentile(windowLoad, 50) AS 'Percentile' FROM PageViewTiming WHERE appName LIKE '%PHP%' and timingName LIKE '%windowLoad%' FACET appName TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000 AS `Total Usage of Instances` FROM Metric WHERE metricTimesliceName LIKE '%Supportability/UsageTotal%' AND appName LIKE '%PHP%' TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT count(newrelic.timeslice.value) AS `Instance Reported` FROM Metric WHERE metricTimesliceName LIKE '%Instance/Reporting%' AND `appName` LIKE '%PHP%' TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT average(newrelic.timeslice.value) * 1000 AS `Count of user executed` FROM Metric WHERE metricTimesliceName LIKE '%Supportability/execute/user/call_count%' AND `appName` LIKE '%PHP%' TIMESERIES AUTO

widgets.title: Transaction Count (Use filter to get specific data)

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) WHERE (transactionType LIKE '%Web%') and ((tags.language LIKE '%php%') or (appName LIKE '%php%')) EXTRAPOLATE FACET appName
FROM Transaction select average(duration) as 'Total Duration' where transactionType LIKE '%Web%'
FROM Transaction SELECT percentage(count(*), where error is not false) as 'Error Rate' where transactionType LIKE '%Web%'
FROM Transaction SELECT count(*) as 'Throughput' where transactionType LIKE '%Web%'
